Goal.Tooltip: Can be any of the types of Fish
You can choose what shall be the width/length/height.
NOT Cobblestone
Raw and cooked variants count as one (e.g. Raw Beef and Steak)

Goal.Description: Grow a Tree in the Nether
Shoot a Button with an Arrow
Fish a Treasure and a Junk item
Build a glass cube and fill the inner with lava

Goal.Tooltip: The 2 Creepers must be in the same boat at the same time
The plant, NOT the block

Goal.Description: Light Gray Dye and Light Blue Dye
Water Bucket, Lava Bucket and Milk Bucket
Finish where you spawned using a Compass
Goal.Tooltip: Be stood close enough to spin your compass within a couple blocks at the end of the game
NOT Cobblestone

Goal.Description: Kill a Creeper with only fire
Rotten Flesh, Spider Eye, Bone, Gunpowder and Ender Pearl
Wear 4 different colour Leather Armour at the same time

Goal.Tooltip: Raw and cooked variants count as one (e.g. Raw Beef and Steak)
Raw and cooked variants count as one (e.g. Raw Beef and Steak)

Goal.Description: Place a Cactus in a Flower Pot
Kill a Skeleton with it's own Arrow

Goal.Tooltip: Get the rare Bow item drop from a Skeleton

Goal.Description: Finish by jumping from top to bottom of the world
Goal.Tooltip: Dig a hole to bedrock and build to 256 Y (height limit), then jump from top to bottom at the end of the game
Never eat meat, including fish
Only eat meat

Goal.Description: Kill yourself with your own arrow
Get a '... while trying to escape ...' Death message
Goal.Tooltip: Example: 'PLAYER' drowned while trying to escape a Skeleton

Goal.Description: Set fire to a Villager's House
Finish on top of the world
Goal.Tooltip: Build up to 256 Y (the height limit) and stand on the top at the end of the game

Goal.Description: Kill a hostile mob with Gravel/Sand
Put a Carpet on a Llama
Activate a $var1x$var2 Nether Portal (not counting corners)
Goal.Tooltip: Width/height of the obsidian frame, disregarding corners (or in other words, width/height of the - once activated - purple portal area).

Goal.Description: Place an Iron, Gold and Diamond block on top of each other
Kill a hostile mob with an Anvil

Goal.Tooltip: No death allowed, including if immediately caused by completing the last goal (e.g. inadvertently dying to the explosion of "Detonate a TNT-Minecart")
Includes: Beetroot Seeds, Melon Seeds, Nether Wart, Pumpkin Seeds and (Wheat) Seeds. As per the 'A Seedy Place' advancement.

Goal.Description: Wear 4 Different Armour types at the same time
Goal.Tooltip: Example: GOLD shoes, LEATHER Trousers, IRON Chestplate and DIAMOND Helmet

Goal.Description: Activate a Nether Portal inside of a Village
Use a lead on a Rabbit
Hang a mob with a lead
Goal.Tooltip: Suspend a mob in mid air using a fence and a lead
Never use Coal for any crafting recipes, fuel in a furnace or trades, CAN use Charcoal

Goal.Description: Dig straight down to Bedrock from Sea level (1x1 hole)

Goal.Tooltip: Never use a Sword for Combat or Block Breaking. Holding or crafting is fine.
Use an Iron Sword until it breaks, if you are unsure if you did check the Statistics screen!

Goal.Description: Clean a Pattern off a Banner
Add a Marker to a Map
Water Bucket, Lava Bucket, Milk Bucket, Bucket of Fish
Goal.Tooltip: Can be any of the types of Fish

Goal.Description: Leash a Dolphin to a Fence
Blue Shield with White Flower Charge

Goal.Tooltip: If you don't have Silk Touch I know a guy who might pick one up for you...
DRY Sponge, not a wet one
Get a Slime Block, place it on the ground and give it a good old bouncin' on
Get the rare Golden Sword item drop from a Pigman

Goal.Description: Finish by launching Fireworks of $var Different Colours
Kill yourself with an Ender Pearl
Goal.Tooltip: Need to die to the damage taken from USING a pearl (not subsequent fall/other damage)

Goal.Description: Finish on top of a Blaze spawner
Goal.Tooltip: Stand on top of a Blaze spawner at the end of the game

Goal.Description: Ice Block on top of a Magma Block

Goal.Tooltip: You can choose what shall be the width/length/height.
Includes: Beetroot Seeds, Melon Seeds, Nether Wart, Pumpkin Seeds and (Wheat) Seeds. As per the 'A Seedy Place' advancement.

Goal.Description: Finish on top of a stairway to Heaven
Goal.Tooltip: Using Stairs, build up to 256 Y (the height limit) and stand on the top at the end of the game (If you need to jump over a block it's not a finished stairway)

Goal.Description: Get a Ghast into the Overworld
Never wear Armour or use Shields
Kill a mob that is wearing Full Iron Armour
Get a '... didn't want to live in the same world as ...' Death message

Goal.Tooltip: Coal, Diamond, Emerald, Gold, Iron, Lapis Lazuli, Nether Quatz and Redstone ores are your choices
Splash variants count! Even Lingering if you want to get crazy
Leather, Gold, Iron, Diamond and yes, even Chainmail

Goal.Description: Any hostile mob head OTHER than a Wither Skeleton's
Fill a Double Chest with 3456 items
Place 1 of each Mineral block on top of each other
Goal.Tooltip: Coal, Iron, Gold, Diamond, Redstone, Lapis, Emerald and Quartz blocks

Goal.Description: Save yourself with a Totem of Undying
Get a villager into The End

Goal.Tooltip: The alive stuff, not the Dead Coral Blocks
